title: Arsenal Coaching Staff | Team Behind the Team
snippet: He is also nicknamed ‘AirPod Albert’ for his use of wireless headphones whilst on the sidelines. ... Arsenal strengthened Arteta’s coaching staff in July 2025 by landing Gabriel Heinze.

title: 2025–26 Arsenal F.C. season - Wikipedia
snippet: On 8 July, Arsenal announced the appointment of former Argentinian defender Gabriel Heinze as a first team assistant coach, replacing Carlos Cuesta who departed the club to become the Head Coach of Serie A side Parma on 19 June.

title: Gabriel Heinze joins coaching team | News | Arsenal.com
snippet: Login Create account · Search arsenal.com · News · Share Arsenal Media 08 Jul 2025 · We are delighted to announce the appointment of Gabriel Heinze to our coaching staff as men’s First Team Coach.

title: Arsenal FC - Staff | Transfermarkt
snippet: Trainer, Manager und Co.: Diese Statistik listet alle Mitarbeiter, gegliedert nach ihrer Funktion, von dem Verein Arsenal auf, die aktuell für den Verein arbeiten.

title: Heinze joins Arsenal coaching staff | beIN SPORTS
snippet: Mikel Arteta has added to his coaching staff following the exit of Carlos Cuesta, with former team-mate Gabriel Heinze joining the team.
